General.Name: Beijing Kingsoft Office Software In
General.Description: Beijing Kingsoft Office Software, Inc. develops and operates WPS series office software. Its products include WPS office; WPS cloud documents; Kingsoft PDF pro; Kingsoft wordmaster enterprise edition; WPS open platform; and WPS certification. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Tao  Song
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Deputy GM
